meta.title: Stefan Weiß | IT Specialist for Application Development
meta.description: Portfolio of Stefan Weiß – Fachinformatiker für Anwendungsentwicklung. Java, Kotlin, Spring Boot, React, Angular. Clean code and maintainable software.

hero.tagline: Focus on object-oriented software development. Solid knowledge in Java, Kotlin and modern frontend technologies. Structured, reliable way of working and high standards for clean, maintainable code.

about.title: About Me
about.text: Prospective IT specialist for application development with a focus on object-oriented software development. Solid knowledge in Java, Kotlin (incl. Android) and modern frontend technologies. Structured, reliable way of working and high demand for clean, maintainable code.

items.title: Gebäudemanagement Marx
items.description: Custom website for a building management company. Design in Figma, implementation with React and TypeScript, containerized with Docker.

items.title: Fewozeno – Booking & Occupancy Plan
items.description: Digital solution for Fewozeno. Booking and occupancy plan for 90+ vacation rentals – central overview and management.
Development and maintenance of warehouse and tour planning software (C++, C#). Involvement in internal projects with Angular, TypeScript, ASP.NET and CI/CD pipeline setup.

items.company: District Office Berchtesgadener Land, Bad Reichenhall
items.description: Work across several departments with focus on IT. Support as system integrator, setup and maintenance of workstations. Insights into IT infrastructure and administrative processes.
Involvement in branch operations: goods receipt, warehouse organization, customer advice and support in the sales area.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: I'm open to new opportunities and would love to hear from you.
